Country_Description: Austria, officially the Republic of Austria, is a landlocked East Alpine country in the southern part of Central Europe. It is composed of nine federated states, one of which is Vienna, Austria's capital and largest city. Austria is famous for its castles, palaces and buildings, among other architectural works.
Required_Documents: The passport must be valid for at least six months after your intended departure from Schengen States
UAE residence visa should be valid for 03 months from the date of return from Schengen
Recent passport photographs showing full face on a clear white background (35 mm X 45 mm)
Original personal bank account statement for the last six months signed and stamped by the bank
NOC Letter from the company (should be mentioned designation, date of joining & salary paid)
Sponsored family members have to enclose a copy of original birth and marriage certificate

Tourism: Hotel booking reservation/s confirming the duration of stay
Travel itinerary such as airline bookings/tickets showing departure dates and destinations
Visiting family and/or friends: Invitation letter from the host in Australia
If visiting family: Copy of passport and Residence proof in Australia
A covering letter outlining the reason for your travel to Australia
Business/Conference or Training for a Co: Invitation letter from the company in Australia

Fineway_Assistance: Detailed guidance with documentation that will reduce the chances of rejection
Make an appointment to submit your documents at the appropriate visa application center
Making arrangements for flight and hotel booking (Only for visa purpose)
One-to-one attention from a dedicated staff member who will guide you through the entire application procedure
General_Conditions: Your passport must be valid for at least another 6 months and have at least two blank visa pages
Embassy reserves the right to ask for further documents if required
